mapper.select: select * from test_movie_details details full outer join test_movie_info info on details.mi_num = info.mi_num full outer join test_movie_genre genre on info.g_num = genre.g_num where info.mi_condition = 1

select * from test_movie_details details full outer join test_movie_info info on details.mi_num = info.mi_num full outer join test_movie_genre genre on info.g_num = genre.g_num where info.mi_condition = 1 order by info.mi_total_point desc

select * from test_movie_details details full outer join test_movie_info info on details.mi_num = info.mi_num full outer join test_movie_genre genre on info.g_num = genre.g_num where info.mi_condition = 0

select * from test_movie_details details full outer join test_movie_info info on details.mi_num = info.mi_num full outer join test_movie_genre genre on info.g_num = genre.g_num where genre.g_num = #{g_num} order by info.mi_total_point desc

select * from test_movie_details details full outer join test_movie_info info on details.mi_num = info.mi_num full outer join test_movie_genre genre on info.g_num = genre.g_num where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}
and upper(info.mi_title) like upper('%'||#{keyword}||'%')

select count(*) from test_movie_info
where mi_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into test_movie_info(mi_num, mi_title, mi_condition, g_num, mi_thumbnail) values(test_seq_movie.nextval, #{mi_title}, #{mi_condition}, #{g_num}, #{mi_thumbnail})

insert into test_movie_details(md_num, mi_num, g_num, md_director, md_actor, md_text, md_runtime, md_grade) values(test_seq.nextval, test_seq_movie.currval, #{g_num}, #{md_director}, #{md_actor}, #{md_text}, #{md_runtime}, #{md_grade})
